message.body: hi, I can't get zeronet to compile coffee scripts automagically. I start it with  --coffeescript_compiler /usr/bin/coffee --debug, also have werkzeug and fs installed. Anybody an idea what I've forgotten?
CIA assassins going round
@roguehat: I'm gonna kill myself …

@roguehat: well yeah, it IS privat. But that only means it's located on your hard drive. As soon as somebody has access to your hard drive he can change or delete everything you posted here. (edit: amazing how you can edit everything afterward)
I see chat from March 06 on … btw
